Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It was in depth and allowed me to further my understanding on what I have done wrong. Whereas teachers give very very brief of even one worded feedback that doesn't help me understand what else I could've done.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Using AI is very objective and allows me to see my work from that view and how I could make things better. Teachers give either 'good!' or '??' feedback that makes me feel confused and often times not satisfied with my work.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teachers have very little time to look over your work and mark, but AI is able to give you personal feedback that is catered specifically to you.
